attributes.action: recommend a UK Honour for actress and singer Anita Dobson - which is long overdue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anita Dobson's career as an actress has spanned more than 35 years, although she will be best remembered by many people for her role as Angie Watts in the BBC television soap EastEnders during the 1980's where she became an iconic figure.Anita has taken on many lead roles including comedy, drama, musicals (from January 2008 for an 8 month UK tour of Hello Dolly as Dolly Levi)has just finished an opera for the world famous Wexford Festival.
Anita is Vice president of The Royal London Society for the Blind and is Patron to various Performing Arts Schools

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "recommend a UK Honour for actress and singer Anita Dobson - which is long overdue."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15431.asp

Prime Minister's Office
